name: Q&A Session!
description:
I recently traveled to Kenya for a weekend. I flew with Lufthansa, AirKenya, Swiss, and United. I'll share each of those experiences in detailed trip reports in the coming weeks.

For now, I took some time during my return to the US to answer a few of the ~128 questions you all posed when the channel passed 10,000 subscribers! Take a look. If you asked a question I didn't answer, I'll post a response in the next several days.

Here's a link to Blake Edgington's channel. Check him out!
https://www.youtube.com/user/Blakeyboo1985

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
https://www.youtube.com/jebbrooksflies

Check me out on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jebbrooks/

And don't forget to take a look at my travel blog:
https://greenergrass.com/

Music:
Teenage Dream - Loving Caliber
Walking on Air - Elias Naslin
Slacker's Anthem - Elias Naslin
Reanimation - Dylan Sitts
All music from Epidemic Sound!
